txt.en: 'We did not think you would return empty-handed, either.'
Instance: Head of the Fallen Beast
'Good work. Now set the head aside for a spell while you attend to the corpse.'
'My friends, I have returned from the field.'
'Fear not, my friends. I have been true to my word, and there is a wrapped package just without.'
'I will spare you the sudden shock of discovery. Within you will find the head of a fell-beast.'
'Can it be? The head of the Witch-king's steed?'
'The very same. Study it with care, and learn what you can!'
'When next you return, the head will be on display here, I can promise that.'
'You are most welcome, my friends. May some wisdom come from even this.'
'We did not think you would return so soon, Mithrandir!'
'I never thought I would be able to see such a preserved specimine in my lifetime.'
